markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Drow Priestess](/Monsters.aspx?ID=167)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Many drow priestesses venerate demon lords and other foul divinities.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 18

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 16

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 13
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Drow_DrowPriestess.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 3">[Drow Priestess](/Monsters.aspx?ID=167)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="CE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Drow" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=51" />
<trait label="Elf" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=58" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary](/Sources.aspx?ID=2) pg. 137</row>

**Perception** +9; darkvision

**Languages**
[Abyssal](/Languages.aspx?ID=12), [Elven](/Languages.aspx?ID=4), [Undercommon](/Languages.aspx?ID=11)

**Skills**
[Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +8, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +8, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +9, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) +5, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +7

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +1

**Dex** +2

**Con** +1

**Int** +0

**Wis** +4

**Cha** +1
</row>

**[Light Blindness](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=22)**

**Items**
[Chain Mail](/Armor.aspx?ID=9), [Hand Crossbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=69) (10 bolts), [Lethargy Poison](/Equipment.aspx?ID=120) (4 doses), [steel shield](/Shields.aspx?ID=3) (Hardness 5, HP 20, BT 10), [Religious Symbol](/Equipment.aspx?ID=41)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 20 (22 with shield raised)

**Fort** +8 

**Ref** +7 

**Will** +11 

+1 status to all saves vs. magic, +2 status to all saves vs. mental
</row>

**HP** 39

**Immunities**
sleep

**Shield Block** <actions string="Reaction" />

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 30 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
rapier +9 ([deadly 1d8](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [Disarm](/Traits.aspx?ID=175), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179)),
**Damage** 1d6+2 piercing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
hand crossbow +9 ([range increment 60 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [reload 1](/Traits.aspx?ID=254)),
**Damage** 1d6 piercing plus [_lethargy poison_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=120)

**Divine Prepared Spells** DC 21
- **Cantrips (2nd)**
[Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66), [Guidance](/Spells.aspx?ID=142), [Know Direction](/Spells.aspx?ID=169), [Read Aura](/Spells.aspx?ID=246), [Stabilize](/Spells.aspx?ID=307)
- **1st**
[Bless](/Spells.aspx?ID=25), [Command](/Spells.aspx?ID=45), [Fear](/Spells.aspx?ID=110)
- **2nd**
[Harm](/Spells.aspx?ID=146) (x3), [Silence](/Spells.aspx?ID=287), [Spiritual Weapon](/Spells.aspx?ID=306)

**Divine Innate Spells** DC 17
- **Cantrips (4th)**
[Dancing Lights](/Spells.aspx?ID=58)
- **1st**
[Command](/Spells.aspx?ID=45) (at will)
- **2nd**
[Darkness](/Spells.aspx?ID=59) (at will), [Faerie Fire](/Spells.aspx?ID=107) (at will)
- **3rd**
[Dispel Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=78), [Levitate](/Spells.aspx?ID=170) (x3)
- **4th**
[Darkness](/Spells.aspx?ID=59)

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-37" />
name: Drow Priestess
